solution_line_template: With the tanks already built it has room for {tanks_built} tanks * {capacity_built_tanks} fish/tank = <<{tanks_built}*{capacity_built_tanks}={fish_in_built_tanks}>>{fish_in_built_tanks} fish.
The total of fish that still lack space is {total_fish_needed} fish - {fish_in_built_tanks} fish = <<{total_fish_needed}-{fish_in_built_tanks}={fish_lacking_space}>>{fish_lacking_space} fish.
This means Jennifer needs {fish_lacking_space} fish / {capacity_new_tanks} fish/tank = <<{fish_lacking_space}/{capacity_new_tanks}={new_tanks_needed}>>{new_tanks_needed} tanks of 10 fish.
